sub_title: A dynamic and entrepreneurial professional with 4+ years of experience in E-commerce and business development in the FMCG & Luxury Goods Industry.
summary:
A dynamic and entrepreneurial e-commerce professional with 4+ years of Middle Eastern experience in E-commerce and business development in the FMCG & Luxury Goods Industry. I am a fast and zestful leaner who is accustomed to working in a fast-paced environment. 
Currently, I am pursuing my Masters in the Netherland to enhance my Media & Business knowledge while simultaneously looking for an opportunity to acquire practical experience of the European Market.

education.degree_name: BA Honours Advertising, PR and Media

school.name: St. Joseph’s College for Women, Karachi - Pakistan
St. Joseph’s Convent Girls School, Karachi - Pakistan

profile_positions.description:
- Manage relationships with marketplaces such as Amazon & Noon (local player) for brands such as Police, Saint Honore Paris, Ducati Corse, Versus Versace, Swiss Military Hanowa, Timberland. & Hair Burst.

- Develop merchandising plans based on customer insights, brand strategy, e-commerce goals and initiatives to achieve substantial uplifts in revenue, site conversion and average order size, improve user experience, and enhance product discovery and content.

- Online content and product management ensuring proper presentation of the brand and product.

- Collaborate with Clients’ teams to tell key merchandising stories and work with site and development team to ensure we deliver these stories against the consumer experience.

- Responsible for the management and day-to-day trading of a products online, including maintenance of Product Landing & Detail Pages

- Implement the trading strategy in conjunction with the Clients & E-Commerce Manager.

- Responsible for stock allocation for online, working closely with the Clients to secure stock. Also, responsible for the effective management of online inventory and ranges.

- Working closely with the Clients and E-Commerce Manager to define, agree and execute sales and promotional plans.

- Provide market, competitive, strategic and tactical information to help better introduce/implement products, programs and services and refine approach as needed.

- Manage order processing, fulfillment and payments.

- Optimize the listings to improve their search performance.

- Provide in-depth monthly sales, stock and traffic report and analysis to the clients along with suggestions to improve performance
 
- Communicate effectively with rest of Digital team to determine opportunities for cross-collaboration and promotions.
profile_positions.title: Online - Marketplace Manager

profile_positions.description:
Building and managing relationships with regional etailers such as Amazon, Noon, Instashop, Taw9eel, Sultan Center et cetera in order to build brand presence and achieve the targeted sales revenue, as well as identify new trends and opportunities for business growth and implement action plans according to timelines.
Achievements:
• RB Value Award 2020 for Ownership
• RB Middle East Ecommerce Award 2020 for building momentum in adverse circumstances and limited resources, Demonstrating a growth hacking mindset.

- Portfolio Management: Working with relevant stakeholders to ensure all etailers have our brands (Dettol, Durex, Veet, Strepsils) listed and products pages have correct pricing and A+, B+ and Primary Content where applicable to provide consumers with the best in class experience and product knowledge while going through the purchasing process. At the same time, also reporting and removing any counterfeit products sold by third-party sellers to protect the brands reputation.

- Product Availability: Devise and implement monthly forecasts with the distributor and etailers based on month on month sales learning to maintain a healthy inventory. Achieved 96% availability on Amazon and 80% on Noon versus 50% and 26% respectively.

- Absolute Sales growth: Achieved 300% growth in absolute sell out by actively supporting in building and executing monthly eventing plans based on sales learning on a brand and platform level to grow the business month on month.

- Data Tracking: Develop and Maintain weekly/ monthly sales trackers of all etailers to support the e-com team to get actionable insight to grow the business.

- Budget Management: Performed budget management tasks such as raising pos, developing and Maintain trackers to monitor monthly spends and creating forecasts for monthly spends.
profile_positions.title: E-Commerce executive- Activations

profile_positions.description:
Supporting the Developing Markets Media & Digital Lead to implement the best in class strategy and digital disciplines in order to drive stronger media effectiveness and ROI in local markets.

- Create, Manage and update CPS Tracker on a weekly/monthly basis to support local markets with redesigning the global strategic roadmap to fit their needs and bridge the media strategy gap between Global and developing markets.

- Supporting the primary lead to ensure the Operational strategy implemented by local markets focuses on Digital and Data usage: Driving Tools & Systems, Golden rules and Media know-how.

- Assisted with organizing Leadership meetings and presentations where most company strategic decisions were discussed and aligned.

- Organizing and keeping marketing material ready in order to assist the team with any asset requirements.
profile_positions.title: Marketing Media & Digital Intern (3 month internship)

profile_positions.description:
Assisting the Strategy, Client Servicing and Social Media departments to liaise between the teams to manage, review progress and deliver the client requirements.

- Strategy Department: Assisted the Strategy team with qualitative market research to create brand and communication strategy, planning and analysis in integrated projects for brands such as President Cheese and Reckitt Benckiser.

- Client Servicing Department: Supported the Senior Account Manager to liaise between all departments to develop action plans based on key products and content creation to ensure the launch of campaigns for brands such as Rimmel, OPI, Roberto Cavalli, Chloe and Ghawali Fragrances.

- Social Media Department: worked with Social media managers Ito brainstorm and create monthly social calendars, streamline company social media accounts (e.g. Facebook, Instagram, Twitter) and creating performance reports for brands such as First Gulf Bank and Rimmel.
profile_positions.title: Intern

profile_positions.description:

•	Strong customer service skills with the ability to resolve customer conflicts, should they arise.
•	Read, write and communicate effectively with co-workers and the general public.

profile_positions.description:
•	Information booth - Provide information on the activation and Yasalam Festival, including after race concerts and race timings etc.
•	App management – Walk around the Plaza Pit and encourage guest to participate in the Interactive Activation Quiz App.
•	Byky Challenge – Encourage guest to take part in the 3 course Fun Byky Challenge to go round a purpose built track.  
•	Children’s area - Manage and oversee the children’s area
•	Cultural Village Management: As part of the cultural village there were henna artists, calligraphy and the Abu Dhabi Falcon Hospital on site allowing people to have their names written in traditional Arabic calligraphy and have their picture taken with real falcons

profile_positions.company: EMDI Institute of Media and Communications Dubai
profile_positions.description:
•	Collect data and produce reports to provide prospect and applicant information to the institute personnel and administration team.
•	Advertising support. Market programs and facilities by preparing and providing informational brochures; assisting with answering questions over phone, emails and walk in.
•	Develop and foster relationships with students and parents through various activities and events.
•	Schedule admission appointments with potential students to assist with any queries to help them get started.
•	Assist with general advising of new students.
•	Maintain general knowledge of institute activities, programs and requirements.
•	Assist with direct and follow up on telephone and email follow-up with student prospects.
•	Implement, monitor and manage regular communication plan with prospective students, applicants, and accepted students using the administrative computing system.
•	Attend team meetings to stay updated on issues relating to admissions.
•	Work with international student program.
•	Supervise students and manage exams.
•	Performs other related tasks as required
profile_positions.title: Student & Admissions Coordinator
